item.title: Prices | Build Hello Business
item.description: DRAFT CONTENT [literally the first 20 minutes of notes, come back later (or lend a hand), just don’t complain] Themed versus custom websites Themed websites used the backend and aspects of, or all of, the themes design. This saves time and repetition work, but can come with problems, in that themes are often unpolished, and can require subtantial rehousing, or contain fundamental flaws that are not immediately visible.
